A Calendar of upcoming NetBeans events

31 May 2016: NetBeans Day England
31st May, 2016 - 31st May, 2016, Greenwich University, London, England
The NetBeans community invites you to a day filled with free sessions and workshops, where you will learn about the latest technology trends and gain many practical experiences with some of the latest powerful technologies and techniques.

31 March 2016: NetBeans Day Germany
31st Mar, 2016 - 31st Mar, 2016, Oracle office, Munich, Germany
The NetBeans community invites you to a day filled with free sessions and workshops, where you will learn about the latest technology trends and gain many practical experiences with some of the latest powerful technologies and techniques.

17 February 2016: NetBeans Day Netherlands
17th Feb, 2016 - 17th Feb, 2016, Oracle office, Utrecht, Netherlands
The NetBeans community invites you to a day filled with free sessions and workshops, where you will learn about the latest technology trends and gain many practical experiences with some of the latest powerful technologies and techniques.

NetBeans at JavaOne 2015
26th Oct, 2015 - 29th Oct, 2015, San Francisco
Join members of the NetBeans team, Java Champions, NetBeans Dream Team members, Java User Group Leaders and fellow NetBeans community members at JavaOne 2015, the destination to share best practices, proven solutions, code samples, and demos that show how to apply Java technology to real-world projects.

NetBeans Day in San Francisco
25th Oct, 2015, San Francisco
As every year, NetBeans Day in San Francisco will kick off JavaOne!

NetBeans Day Paris
16th Oct, 2015, Paris, France
La communauté NetBeans vous invite pour une conférence gratuite d'une journée. Venez rencontrer d'autres utilisateurs de NetBeans, découvrir ou apprendre à utiliser NetBeans. Cette conférence se concentre sur NetBeans et les technologies utilisées par NetBeans -- plus spécifiquement Java, JavaScript, PHP et bien d'autres!

JAX London
12th Oct, 2015 - 14th Oct, 2015, London, England
How can you make sure that your next Web application supports not only the desktop browser but also all the other devices and screen sizes? And that it can efficiently talk to the back-end services in a bidirectional way? Join this session where NetBeans will be used for demos during the upcoming JAX London.

Oracle Cloud Day Netherlands
6th Oct, 2015, Nijkerk, Netherlands
Oracle Cloud Day is coming to the Netherlands! For example, in an interactive workshop, you will see many demos—with code—and very few slides, and a lot of discussion, to introduce you to many new and exciting tools and technologies integrated into NetBeans that help you climb into the Cloud. Join this eventful day and find out what the Cloud can do for you.

NetBeans Day in Brasil
22nd Jun, 2015, Sao Paolo
The Oracle office hosted the latest NetBeans Day in Sao Paolo, Brazil.

NetBeans Day in Greece
17th Apr, 2015 - 18th Apr, 2015, Athens
Come to Athens, Greece for the latest NetBeans Day!

NetBeans Day in Germany
16th Mar, 2015 - 16th Mar, 2015, Oracle office, Munich, Germany
A few months ago, in December 2014, the Oracle office in Munich, Germany, was used for the first time to host a NetBeans Day. It was a big success. At that event, we immediately decided we wanted to have another day just like it and soon!

APAC: Virtual Technology Summit with NetBeans Session
4th Mar, 2015 - 4th Mar, 2015, Live Webinar
The Oracle Technology Network (OTN) is excited to invite you to the Virtual Technology Summit Series. Four times a year come and join us to learn first hand from Oracle ACEs, Java Champions, and Oracle product experts, as they share their insight and expertise on using Oracle technologies to meet today’s IT challenges. Four main content areas covered will be Database, Java, Middleware and Systems.

EMEA: Virtual Technology Summit with NetBeans Session
25th Feb, 2015 - 25th Feb, 2015, Live Webinar
The Oracle Technology Network (OTN) is excited to invite you to the Virtual Technology Summit Series. Four times a year come and join us to learn first hand from Oracle ACEs, Java Champions, and Oracle product experts, as they share their insight and expertise on using Oracle technologies to meet today’s IT challenges. Four main content areas covered will be Database, Java, Middleware and Systems.

NetBeans Day in the Netherlands
12th Feb, 2015 - 12th Feb, 2015, Oracle office, Utrecht, the Netherlands
Learn about Java, AngularJS, and much more, for free! Join Adam Bien, Geertjan Wielenga and many other rockstar speakers at the first NetBeans Day in the Netherlands.

Americas: Virtual Technology Summit with NetBeans Session
11th Feb, 2015 - 11th Feb, 2015, Live Webinar
The Oracle Technology Network (OTN) is excited to invite you to the Virtual Technology Summit Series. Four times a year come and join us to learn first hand from Oracle ACEs, Java Champions, and Oracle product experts, as they share their insight and expertise on using Oracle technologies to meet today’s IT challenges. Four main content areas covered will be Database, Java, Middleware and Systems.

GDG DevFest Istanbul
6th Dec, 2014 - 6th Dec, 2014, Istanbul, Turkey
Join NetBeans partners IDRsolutions, Vaadin, and PrimeFaces in Istanbul, Turkey, including several sessions where NetBeans will be featured.

NetBeans Day in Germany
2nd Dec, 2014 - 2nd Dec, 2014, Oracle office, Munich, Germany
Join Adam Bien, Markus Eisele, Gerrit Grunwald, and many other rockstar speakers at the first NetBeans Day in Germany.

JavaOne 2014
28th Sep, 2014 - 2nd Oct, 2014, San Francisco
JavaOne 2014 registration is open. Join up with the world's leading Java experts and community members.

Register Now

NetBeans Community Day at JavaOne 2014
28th Sep, 2014 - 28th Sep, 2014, San Francisco, California
NetBeans Community Day returns again to JavaOne 2014!

Various organizations and Java experts will show how they are using NetBeans technology to deliver innovative solutions and applications. Mingle with members of the NetBeans team, the Dreamteam and other NetBeans enthusiasts from around the world.

Date: Sunday, September 28
Location: Moscone South - 200

*NetBeans Community Day is open and free to registered JavaOne conference attendees only.

Free Monthly Java Q&A Sessions with Adam Bien
1st Sep, 2014 - 1st Sep, 2014, Virtual
Java Champion Adam Bien is turning his "Airhacks Q&A" session into a regular monthly event! Every first Monday of the month at 6:00pm CET, Adam will take your real-time questions about software development, architecture, and Java EE, Java SE and JavaFX coding. Registration is free. Learn more.

Virtual JUG: Opinionated JavaFX 8
27th Aug, 2014 - 27th Aug, 2014, Virtual
How to build an app with Java FX? WYSIWYG or manual hacking? How to integrate with Java EE backend? What is a Presenter, Controller or a View? Do we need data binding?

In this virtual session, join consultant and author Adam Bien for a look at JavaFX 8 from the application perspective with a focus on structure, architecture and (software) design.

Oracle Virtual Technology Summit (Now ON DEMAND)
9th Jul, 2014 - 16th Jul, 2014, Virtual/Online
OTN's Virtual Technology Summit on July 9th (NA), July 10th (EMEA) and July 16th (APAC) provides technical Java info from Oracle experts and Java Community members--for free. Sessions in the Java Track include:

Efficient architectures for creating MapReduce Pipelines
by Fabiane Nardon, Java Champion and Big Data Expert

JavaScript/HTML5 Rich Clients Using Java EE 7
by Reza Rahman, Java Evangelist and Java EE Expert

How to Become an Embedded Developer by Angelia Caicedo, Java Evangelist and Java Embedded Expert

The event is free.

Oracle Java ME Embedded MOOC
30th May, 2014 - 4th Jul, 2014, Virtual/Online
Oracle Massive Open Online Course: Develop Java Embedded Applications Using a Raspberry Pi

Have you wondered what the future of embedded devices looks like? Have you ever wanted to create your own weather station or design a device to control the lights in your home automatically? All of these questions will be answered in this practical and FREE hands-on course. This course introduces Java developers to the world of embedded devices and the Internet of Things (IoT).

Cost: FREE
Duration: 5 Weeks - Starts May 30, 2014

Java Virtual Developer Day (Now ON DEMAND)
6th May, 2014 - 28th May, 2014, Virtual
Join developers from around the world to get the latest information about Java--Java SE 8, Java EE and Java Embedded--from the experts!

This FREE virtual event covers:
  • Java SE 8 New Features: Lambdas and more
  • A technical introduction to the Java EE 7 platform
  • How Java makes it easy for you to control a wide range of embedded devices
Register or login to watch on-demand.

Vaadin NetBeans JavaEE Webinar (Now ON DEMAND)
3rd Apr, 2014 - 3rd Apr, 2014, Virtual/Online
Join Geertjan Wielenga from the Oracle NetBeans team and Matti Tahvonen from Vaadin for a Webinar on how to build a fullstack Vaadin + JPA + Glassfish application in minutes. You'll learn how to leverage NetBeans and the Vaadin plugin at the same time and have a chance to ask questions from both Geertjan and Matti.

Java 8 Launch Webcast (Now ON DEMAND)
25th Mar, 2014 - 25th Mar, 2014, Virtual
Join Oracle and the Java developer and partner communities for the launch of Java 8. With a live webcast keynote and more than 35 screencasts, listen in, ask questions and learn how Java 8 can help you create the future.
